body: @ShortShork is an example of what people should be in a common sense, respect other fantasies and not shitting on it. But tbh this kind of thought should be known to everyone, I mean, it’s internet

Hey @ShortShork i just wanted to thank you for trying to enlighten people in here regarding the philosophy of fetishes, no irony in here. What you said in here was quite based and people need to stop shitting on others just because they enjoy different types of eroge. Peace.

I’m not trying to be intellectual, if u can see my Favourites u’d be suprise by the guro tags. I just feel annoyed whenever someone came upon a guro book and shaming ppl for their taste.

People's here became intellectual all of a sudden and the howny begone,in this comment section there is no trace of hownyness perhaps it's because of the guro tag but overall it's good it makes us open mind of the possibilities the world is offering us.

So what u say is that all ppl on the earth have to live by that standard “be normal”. And we can’t express our likes and dislikes, differences. If you’re not normal then ppl will cal u out on it, ur a weirdo, disgusting? And u seriously think bc someone read guro or other dark themes, they become “internet recluses”? I read guro, i do not kill ppl while reading guro. Ur world view force others to become “normal”, not allowing ppl to have any others weird fetishes. Ppl do read dark stuff, but tomorrow they’ll go to work and act like any “normal” person would. Bc they have kink for horse, that doesn’t mean they don’t have a normal life, normal family and loved ones.

A pretty widely accepted definition of evil is "causing harm and suffering unnecessarily", and most of the stuff that will get the so called "vanilla fans", or you know, by definition, normal people, to act up usually fits that definition easily, it's not hard to see why people find it repulsive, and if that turns you on, I think I have all the reasons to call you out on it. It’s always fascinated me when vanilla fans always be nice to their counterparts. But when someone with different taste, i dunno like guro, necro, ntr, ugly, etc. enjoy their own fetishes. These vanilla fans start to act like “This is unacceptable!”. They begin the Order 66 and start purging anyone for their weird fetishes. I’m from both world, i like guro (so what?) and i also like wholsome stuff as well. But i never condemn ppl for their kink. If that person like beastality, leave him be. And again, it’s just art.
